common.name: Name
common.pageNotFound: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account information and preferences
settings.name: Name
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this credential?
settings.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Redirecting to login...
settings.failedLoadCredentials: Failed to load credentials. Please try refreshing the page.
settings.confirmDeletePasskey:
Are you sure you want to remove this passkey?

Note: This will remove the passkey from your account, but you may need to manually delete it from your device's settings (like iCloud Keychain, Google Password Manager, or Windows Hello).

Make sure you have tested your other passkey(s) work before removing this one.
settings.emailChangeWarning: Changes to your email address will require verification before taking effect.
settings.emailVerificationMessage: A verification email has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your inbox and click the verification link.
settings.passkeysDescription: Your account uses passkeys for secure, passwordless authentication. Passkeys are stored securely on your device and provide better security than traditional passwords.
settings.placeholderPasskeyName: Enter a name for this passkey
settings.addPasskeyHelp: Add a passkey for another device or browser
settings.deleteAccountDescription: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountWarning: This will permanently delete your account and remove all passkeys from our servers. However, passkeys stored on your devices (in iCloud Keychain, Google Password Manager, Windows Hello, etc.) will remain and must be manually removed.
settings.deleteAccountWarningWithSignalAPI: This will permanently delete your account and remove all passkeys from our servers. Your browser supports automatic passkey removal.
settings.deleteAccountPasskeyInfo: After deletion, if you try to log in using an old passkey, it will fail. To prevent confusion, please manually remove this account's passkeys from your device settings.
settings.deleteAccountPasskeyInfoWithSignalAPI: After deletion, passkeys will be automatically removed from your device. If you try to log in later, you'll need to create a new account.
settings.deleteAccountError: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
settings.soleAdministratorError: Cannot delete account. You are the sole administrator of '{{orgName}}' which has other members. Please promote another user to admin first.
settings.soleAdministratorErrorGeneric: Cannot delete account. You are the sole administrator of one or more organizations with other members. Please promote another user to admin first.

errors.loadCredentials: Failed to load credentials. Please try refreshing the page.
errors.updateProfile: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
errors.deleteAccount: Failed to delete account. Please try again.
errors.deletePasskey: Failed to delete passkey. Please try again.
errors.updatePasskeyName: Failed to update passkey name. Please try again.
errors.passkeyCreationCancelled: Passkey creation was cancelled or timed out.
errors.sessionExpired: Authentication error: Your session may have expired. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.addPasskey: Failed to add new passkey. Please try again.

organization.title: Organization

roleDescriptions.manager: Can manage teams and most resources
roleDescriptions.editor: Full content management, cannot manage teams
roleDescriptions.publisher: Like editor plus publish workflow actions

teamRoleDescriptions.admin: Can manage team members and resources
teamRoleDescriptions.member: Can access and edit team resources
teamRoleDescriptions.installer: Temporary token for device registration (expires in 24h)

errors.cannotRemoveLastAdmin: You can't remove the last admin of an organization.
errors.invalidRole: The selected role is not valid for this organization.
errors.cannotRemoveLastUser: You cannot leave as you are the only member of this organization.
errors.mediaInUseAsLogo: Cannot delete media that is being used as an organization logo

messages.noOrganizationsRemaining: You have left your last organization. Please contact an administrator to be invited to an organization.

dialogs.removeMemberMessage: Are you sure you want to remove member "{{name}}" from the organization?
dialogs.removeMembersMessage: Are you sure you want to remove the following members from the organization?

organization.leaveOrganizationDescription: Leaving removes your access to organization resources immediately.
organization.leaveOrganizationLastAdminWarning: Add another admin before leaving to keep this organization managed.
organization.leaveOrganizationLastUserWarning: You cannot leave as you are the only member of this organization.
organization.leaveLastOrganizationWarningMessage: This is your only organization. Leaving it will delete your account and you will lose all access to Castmill. You will need to contact an administrator to be invited back. Are you sure you want to proceed?
organization.logoDescription: Choose a media file to use as your organization logo. It will be displayed in the top bar.
organization.noMediasAvailable: No image medias available. Please upload an image first.
